pageProduct.name: Olay Moisturising Lotion 150ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Olay moisturising lotion hydrates with coconut oil for normal/combination skin. The moisturiser hydrates and repairs to give you timeless, beautiful skin for life. Light & non greasy formulation with coconut and castor seed oil for all day hydration.

OLAY With Coconut & Castor Seed Oil OLAY® MOISTURISING LOTION ALL DAY HYDRATION LIGHT & NON-GREASY

Discover Olay. Skincare that meets the needs of every woman. Olay has evolved from once iconic beauty fluid to an extensive skincare brand that delivers younger looking, beautiful skin. With multiple ranges to choose from, women can be assured their skincare routine is tailored to meet their individual wants, needs, aspirations and concerns- be it hydration, sun protection, or targeting ageing. Women are therefore able to challenge what's possible with their skin.

Suitable For: Normal/Combination Skin

Product Claims: Hydrates and repairs to give you timeless, beautiful skin for life

Boxed Contents: 24 Count

Size: 150ml

KEY FEATURES

• REPLENISHES NORMAL/COMBINATION SKIN
This lotion is formulated with ingredients to help improve and maintain youthful looking skin.
• Its formula:
• Is designed to be light, non-greasy and quickly absorbed into skin.
• Quickly replenishes essential moisture.
• Results:
OLAY moisturising lotion has been shown to:
• Significantly boost skin hydration.
• Leave skin soft and smooth.
• OLAY moisturising lotion is part of the Essential care range. For younger looking skin, also use
• OLAY cleanser
• OLAY purifying toner
• Increase skin suppleness and firmness.
• Improve skin smoothness.

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse well with water.
Important information, do not discard outer package.

Ingredients

WATER, GLYCERIN, SORBITAN STEARATE, DIMETHICONE, MINERAL OIL, PETROLATUM, CETYL RICINOLEATE, DIMETHICONOL, CETYL ALCOHOL, SUCROSE COCOATE, PHENOXYETHANOL, METHYLPARABEN, GLYCERYL HYDROXYSTEARATE, FRAGRANCE, STEARETH-100, DISODIUM EDTA, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, PROPYLPARABEN, CARBOMER, ACRYLATES/C10-30 ALKYL ACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER, STEARIC ACID, PALMITIC ACID, CI 17200

Directions

Smooth evenly onto cleansed face and neck twice a day.

USAGE ADVICE

Olay moisturising lotion is part of the Essential Care range. For younger looking skin, also use:
- Olay cleanser.
- Olay purifying toner.
